name: Oscillate
description:
Oscillate is a Stylized experience online Multiplayer car racing game by Nadan Studio.
Start your racing by enjoying the beauty of speeding, rushing, darting with your close friends in versus mode or in online multiplayer or if you want Solo you can. So Are you ready to rush around the globe?

KEY FEATURES

  • 1. Unique Car physics

Don't expect Realistic Car physics From this game. We'll give you a very unique and interesting Car Physics throughout the game!

  • 2. Rush into the Glove

Race through 50+ adventurous & aesthetic environment related to our globe. You will find all of your favorite environments like forests, cities, mountains, villages, deserts, lakes etc.

  • 3 . Race With Your Friends Online and Offline

You can compete with your friends locally in the versus mode. You'll also have another option to play multiplayer by which you will be able to race with your online friends.

  • 4. Photo Mode

Do you love to take photos and showcase them in your community? Well, We have this fun feature as well! You can take photos of your favorite scenes, cars and get as creative as you want to. Have fun with your adventures while you are playing the game!

  • 5. Practise Drifting For Race

You can go into the freemode and practice to get better at drifting which is very important on multiplayer.

This game doesn’t have:


  • A Cinematic Story.
  • Real-World Scale Cars.


ENJOY!
